title: Antonia: a portrait of the woman
creator_credit: Jill Godmilow, Judy Collins and Phoenix Films
brief_description: Presents a portrait of Antonia Brico, who in the 1930s established an international reputation as an accomplished orchestra conductor. Today she teaches conducting and piano in Denver, while leading the Brico Symphony, a community orchestra which she founded.
creator_credit_for_label: Jill Godmilow, Judy Collins and Phoenix Films
